function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing measures and monitor compliance","Technologies":"Social distancing monitoring technology, CCTV, and contact tracing apps","People":"Those who breach social distancing measures","Owner":"Health authorities, law enforcement, and public health organizations"}]}
